languages.text: "Столь ценный материал, такие невероятные возможности... Я приказываю добавить тассерций в десятину — Империум должен получить как можно больше этого чудесного камня".

traits.locale_text: "Человечество ведет масштабную войну. Война требует ресурсов — а эта планета способна давать больше. Нужно повысить ее ранг, пусть снабжает Империум еще усерднее".

languages.text: "Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."
languages.original_text: "Столь ценный материал, такие невероятные возможности... Я приказываю добавить тассерций в десятину — Империум должен получить как можно больше этого чудесного камня".

traits.locale_text: "Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."
"Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."
"Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."

"Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."

languages.text: “如此珍贵的矿物，如此不可思议的潜力……我在此下令，将塔瑟拉水晶添加到什一税资源清单之中。这种神奇的矿物必须尽可能地为帝国所用。”
languages.original_text: "Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."

traits.locale_text: “如此珍贵的矿物，如此不可思议的潜力……我在此下令，将塔瑟拉水晶添加到什一税资源清单之中。这种神奇的矿物必须尽可能地为帝国所用。”

languages.text: 「これほど貴重な物質、これほど信じがたい可能性を秘めたものだ…タッセリウムをこの惑星の租税に加えるよう命じる。帝国はこの驚異的な石をできる限り多く確保せねばならない」
languages.original_text: "Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「これほど貴重な物質、これほど信じがたい可能性を秘めたものだ…タッセリウムをこの惑星の租税に加えるよう命じる。帝国はこの驚異的な石をできる限り多く確保せねばならない」

languages.text: «Es un material muy valioso, con increíbles posibilidades... Ordeno que se añada el thassertio al diezmo planetario. El Imperium debe poseer tantas de estas maravillosas piedras como sea posible».
languages.original_text: "Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Es un material muy valioso, con increíbles posibilidades... Ordeno que se añada el thassertio al diezmo planetario. El Imperium debe poseer tantas de estas maravillosas piedras como sea posible».

languages.text: "Böylesine değerli bir maden, böylesine inanılmaz olasılıklar... Tasertiyumun gezegen aşarına eklenmesini emrediyorum. İmparatorluk, bu harika taştan mümkün olduğunca çok faydalanmalı."
languages.original_text: "Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesine değerli bir maden, böylesine inanılmaz olasılıklar... Tasertiyumun gezegen aşarına eklenmesini emrediyorum. İmparatorluk, bu harika taştan mümkün olduğunca çok faydalanmalı."

languages.text: « Un matériau si précieux, aux possibilités incroyables... J'ordonne donc que le thassertium soit ajouté à la dîme de la planète. L'Imperium doit rassembler le plus possible de ce merveilleux minerai. »
languages.original_text: "Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Un matériau si précieux, aux possibilités incroyables... J'ordonne donc que le thassertium soit ajouté à la dîme de la planète. L'Imperium doit rassembler le plus possible de ce merveilleux minerai. »

languages.text: "Was für ein wertvolles Material, was für unglaubliche Möglichkeiten ... Ich ordne hiermit an, das Thassertium dem Zehnt des Planeten hinzuzufügen. Das Imperium braucht so viel wie möglich von diesem wunderbaren Stein."
languages.original_text: "Such a valuable material, such incredible possibilities... I hereby order thassertium to be added to the planet's tithe. The Imperium must obtain as much of this marvellous stone as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Was für ein wertvolles Material, was für unglaubliche Möglichkeiten ... Ich ordne hiermit an, das Thassertium dem Zehnt des Planeten hinzuzufügen. Das Imperium braucht so viel wie möglich von diesem wunderbaren Stein."
